import React from 'react' import './../Post/Post.css' import Comment from './../img/comment.png' import Share from './../img/share.png' import Like from './../img/like.png' import NotLike from './../img/notlike.png' const Post = ({data}) => { console.log(data) return (
{data.likes} likes
{data.name} {data.desc}
) } export default Post
